review: We decided to reduce our satellite TV package, basically keeping it for local news, as we watched very few channels of what was offered. We felt we were being forced to pay to subsidize channels we never watched to keep the channels we liked; the package included many sports channels and reality shows that were never viewed. The cost of the Fire TV set up was less expensive than a month's cost for the satellite package we'd had. We like the broad selection of quality shows offered on Fire TV. We have also rented some movies; the price and availability for them was very reasonable, and the payment and delivery of them was easy. I have yet to figure out the voice activated remote, but I'm a bit of a Luddite, so I think that has more to do with me than the remote. The Fire TV was an affordable purchase for us fits our viewing habits.
